titles.title: Supporting the goals and ideals of National Long-Term Care Residents' Rights Week, recognizing the importance to the United States of residents of long-term care facilities, including senior citizens and individuals living with disabilities, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

bill.summary: 10/9/2007--Introduced. Expresses support for the goals and ideals of National Long-Term Care Residents' Rights Week. Recognizes the importance to the United States of residents of long-term care facilities, including senior citizens and individuals living with disabilities.
